Impute the mean value into a vector with missing values

####  Description 

Impute the mean value into a vector with missing values

####  Usage 
<pre><code>

impute_mean(x)
## Default S3 method:
impute_mean(x)
## S3 method for class 'factor'
impute_mean(x)
</code></pre>
#### Arguments 

* ``x``: vector

#### Value 

vector with mean values replaced


#### Examples 
```{r}

vec <- rnorm(10)
vec[sample(1:10, 3)] <- NA
impute_mean(vec)
```
